relation: Campus Police is always there when you need them.. ALWAYS!!
Francis Marion University is a smaller university which makes it cost less than the other huge universities. $$$$$$ :)

In Florence there is hardly anything to do except for partying, which I do not recommend a lot of, bowling, bars, plays and movies. On campus there are plays, movies that are popular and a building called the UC (University Commons). This is the place where you could go swimming, play pool, basketballs games are held, and other fun events.

The food here at Francis Marion Unversity is pretty good. There are two locations that you can choose from to eat. The Cafe is the main place freshmen and Sophomores go to eat. The food there are prepared but people who know how to cook! :) Then there is the Grille, this is the place where people have meetings, just come chill with their friends, watch games or just to grab a snack.

Dorm life at Francis Marion is not that bad. There are always something going on so that you do not have to stay in your room all of the time and more than likely the people that are in your suite become some of your closer friends.

Academically, FMU is a tough school if you do not try and study to your best ability. You have to be willing to learn and strive hard to be successful at Francis Marion University. If you are doing these thing and still struggling then the professors are always looking for ways to help.
For future students that may want to come to Francis Marion University, I give you this advise. Always be true to yourself, get involved with on-campus activities, STUDY, and have fun.

Francis Marion University is located in the small city of Florence, South Carolina, where there are limited things to be distacted from. Francis Marion University is an easy school to get into but a not so easy school to get out. This college requires you to work hard and appreciate education.

textAfterTable: 07/07/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 7 out of 9 people found this review useful. 3 of 63 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Not too far away from home and if you love the BEACH it's nearby!! Tips for prospective students I've been told to not party too much and to always remember what I'm going to school to do. (Get an education). I'd say to everyone, it's your responsibility to get what you need done, but have fun while doing it Will enjoy being here I think I will enjoy being here. Everyone is so nice and very supporting. Will learn a lot The classes are all design to help us. If we need more assistance there is free tutoring services offered! I love that. Students should take advantage of this opportunity.
